CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The electrochemical cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) curve of the PBDT-TDPP-S film coated on a platinum electrode is shown in Figure S3 ( see Supporting Information ) , and the electrochemical data are also summarized in Table 2.

Let's think step by step.

1. PBDT-TDPP-S: This is the name of the material that was used to create the electrochemical CV curve and is coated on the platinum electrode. Therefore, it is the Material Name entity in this paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The electrochemical cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) curve of the PBDT-TDPP-S film coated on a platinum electrode is shown in Figure S3 ( see Supporting Information ) , and the electrochemical data are also summarized in Table 2.

Let's think step by step.

1. Electrochemical cyclic voltammetry (CV) curve: This is a type of electrochemical measurement, specifically a technique used to study redox processes at an electrode surface. The name of the property being measured is the electrochemical cyclic voltammetry curve.
2. PBDT-TDPP-S film: This is a material or substance that has been coated on a platinum electrode. The name of the property is the PBDT-TDPP-S film.
3. Platinum electrode: This is a type of electrode material. The name of the property is the platinum electrode.
4. Figure S3: This is a figure or graph mentioned in the text. The name of the property is Figure S3.
5. Supporting Information: This is a collection of additional data or information provided with the main text. The name of the property is Supporting Information.
6. Table 2: This is a table mentioned in the text where electrochemical data are summarized. The name of the property is Table 2.

So, the identified Property Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. Electrochemical cyclic voltammetry curve
2. PBDT-TDPP-S film
3. Platinum electrode
4. Figure S3
5. Supporting Information
6. Table 2
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PBDT-TDPP-S film: This is a material or substance.

So, the identified Material Property entity in the paragraph is:

1. PBDT-TDPP-S film.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The electrochemical cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) curve of the PBDT-TDPP-S film coated on a platinum electrode is shown in Figure S3 ( see Supporting Information ) , and the electrochemical data are also summarized in Table 2.

Let's think step by step.

1. PBDT-TDPP-S film: This is a material or substance that has been coated on a platinum electrode. It can be considered a "Property Value" entity as it has a specific electrical behavior when undergoing electrochemical cyclic voltammetry.
2. Platinum electrode: This is a type of electrode material. It can be considered a "Property Value" entity as it has specific electrical properties that influence the electrochemical cyclic voltammetry results.
3. Figure S3: This is a visual representation of the data. It can be considered a "Property Value" entity as it contains the electrochemical cyclic voltammetry curve data for the PBDT-TDPP-S film on a platinum electrode.
4. Table 2: This is a tabular representation of data. It can be considered a "Property Value" entity as it contains specific electrochemical data related to the PBDT-TDPP-S film on a platinum electrode.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PBDT-TDPP-S film: This is a material or substance that has a specific electrical behavior when undergoing electrochemical cyclic voltammetry.
2. Electrochemical data: This refers to specific data related to the electrical properties of the PBDT-TDPP-S film during electrochemical cyclic voltammetry.
3. Figure S3: This contains the visual representation of the electrochemical data for the PBDT-TDPP-S film.
4. Table 2: This contains specific numerical data related to the electrochemical properties of the PBDT-TDPP-S film.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value                          |
|--------------------------------------|
| Electrochemical data of PBDT-TDPP-S film |
| Figure S3 (electrochemical curve)     |
| Table 2 (numerical data)              |
| PBDT-TDPP-S film                     |
